overview: Virginal Exorcism, the action begins when in the performance I undress and remove a condom from my uterus with a rose inside which I then set on fire, the rose serves as a symbol of the expulsion to the concept of virginal conception. I then use a penis shaped glass to suck glue which I then rub all over my body. I then proceed to paste images which represent resistance and liberation.
title: Exorcism Virginal
